channel.title: Easter ring help
channel.description:
this is the error
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Welcome to chosen angels compiler, thankyou for using me. --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Note: Remember the rule if you get 100 errors You need a } for every { Errors will show up if any below the line. ________________________________________________________________________________
Errors: ________________________________________________________________________________
client.java:17: cannot find symbol symbol : variable wearID location: class client if (wearID == 7927) //Easter Ring ^ Note: EconomyReset.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint eprecation for details. 1 error Compiling Finished. Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . .
this is the tut i used http://silabsoft.org/smf/index.php?showtopic=14613
this is the code i used for it
[code]public void easter() { if (wearID == 7927) { //Easter Ring npcId = 3689 + misc.random(5); isNpc = true; } [/code]

item.title: Easter ring help

item.description:
@project_soundwave wrote:

delete the + misc.random(5);
that should do the trick

item.title: Easter ring help
item.dc:creator: @humza-ali humza-ali
item.description:
@humza-ali wrote:

this is the error

       Welcome to chosen angels compiler, thankyou for using me.

Note: Remember the rule if you get 100 errors
You need a } for every {
Errors will show up if any below the line.

                                Errors:

client.java:17: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable wearID
location: class client
if (wearID == 7927) //Easter Ring
^
Note: EconomyReset.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint eprecation for details.
1 error
Compiling Finished.
Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . .

this is the tut i used
http://silabsoft.org/smf/index.php?showtopic=14613

this is the code i used for it

public void easter() { if (wearID == 7927) { //Easter Ring npcId = 3689 + misc.random(5); isNpc = true; }
